snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. stopped by the Shanksville Volunteer Fire Department after his speech marking the anniversary of Sept. 11, 2001.
abstract: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. stopped by the Shanksville Volunteer Fire Department after his speech marking the anniversary of Sept. 11, 2001.

headline.main: Biden Invites Shanksville Firefighters to the White House for a Beer
